DOC.brief_summary: Men with Klinefelter syndrome undergo unilateral subcapsular ochiectomy, and the removed testicular tissue is examined for presence of sperm and cryopreserved in small pieces for fertility treatment and scientific purposes. Prior to operation blood samples are frozen in a biobank.
DOC.brief_title: Subcapsular Orchiectomy in Men With Klinefelter Syndrome
